casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Thomas Craig CAMPBELL 252PA14-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 5, 2018 Ms. Barbara S. Blackman, Durham, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Campbell, Thomas Craig Ms. Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Ms. Hannah H. Love, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Campbell, Thomas Craig

Mr. Mike Miller, District Attorney, for State The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 3rd of July 2018 by State of NC :

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of July 2018."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 8th day of August 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
